movies.Title: Casablanca
movies.Writer: Julius J. Epstein (screenplay), Philip G. Epstein (screenplay), Howard Koch (screenplay), Murray Burnett (play), Joan Alison (play)
movies.Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movies.Plot: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

movies.Title: Life Is Beautiful
movies.Actors: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
movies.Plot: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.

movies.Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.Writer: Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay), George Lucas (story), Philip Kaufman (story)
movies.Actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, Ronald Lacey
movies.Plot: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
movies.Language: English, German, Hebrew, Spanish, Arabic, Nepali

movies.Title: Rear Window
movies.Writer: John Michael Hayes (screenplay), Cornell Woolrich (based on the short story by)
movies.Actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
movies.Plot: A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 6 nominations.
